The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.

Calling this method indicates use of dynamic shortcuts, but there are no calls to methods that track shortcut usage, such as `pushDynamicShortcut` or `reportShortcutUsed`. Calling these methods is recommended, as they track shortcut usage and allow launchers to adjust which shortcuts appear based on activation history. Please see https://developer.android.com/develop/ui/views/launch/shortcuts/managing-shortcuts#track-usage
